reviewText: I bought the dvd for the Preacher's Wife, but I enjoyed Keeping the Faith also.  Would recommend this year round.
Both movies are good solid entertainment. The music and acting is superior and the storyline is outstanding.
Thanks for sending the video so quickly. I love both of these movies so it was a double treat to see them together!
The preachers wife was excellent. Keeping The Faith was not what I expected and I couldn't watch it in its entirety. It was awful.
I especially liked Denzel Washington in The Preacher's Wife.
Great Transaction!! Clean, Clear, Bright, Sharp DVD Set!! Fast & Safe Pack/Ship!! Thank You!!
Perfect for the whole family. Romantic, funny, well written.
Like the Keeping the Faith movie other than the many scenes focusing on sex outside of marriage.

Purchased as a gift, they enjoy the movie pack. Keeping the Faith is a cute sort of love story about three life long friends and how a love triangle causes two of them to have their religious faith challenged. The Preacher's wife is sort of a cute story about a couple that rebuilds their marriage with the help of an angel.
Two of my favorite movies in one!!  Couldn't have asked for a better deal.  Romantic comedies at their best and at a good price.  I laughed and I cried!
Two sweet, entertaining movies. Since I love them both, it was cool having them packaged together.  Well worth the cost.

I actually only wanted "The Preacher's Wife"; but "Keeping the Faith" was
an added bonus.  Great value for two movies.
preachers wife is excellant.... Whittney Houstin classsic, so glad i ordered it.  Other movie is just OK, but I purchased this for Preachers wife.
